LanguageData.VFEAncients.Empowered.Label: Experiment Success: {0}
LanguageData.VFEAncients.Empowered.Text: The experiment in the gene-tailoring pod has been a success! {0} has gained the power {1}. However, they have also gained the weakness {2}.
LanguageData.VFEAncients.RemoveWeakness.Label: Experiment Success: {0}
LanguageData.VFEAncients.RemoveWeakness.Text: The experiment in the gene-tailoring pod has been a success! {0} has lost the weakness {1}.
LanguageData.VFEAncients.ExperimentFailed.Death: Subject has died and the experiment failed. No new powers were granted.
LanguageData.VFEAncients.ExperimentFailed.Berserk: Subject has suffered severe brain damage and has gone mad. No new powers were granted.
LanguageData.VFEAncients.ExperimentFailed.BrainDeath: Subject has suffered complete failure of brain functions and is now brain dead. No new powers were granted.
LanguageData.VFEAncients.MessageNoWardenCapableOfRecr: No warden is capable of this recruitment.
LanguageData.VFEAncients.InterrogationSuccessDetail: {0} has successfully interrogated {1}, who has revealed the location of {2}.
LanguageData.VFEAncients.FireAtPodsDesc: Allow the point-defense turret to fire at incoming drop pods that contain enemy raiders.
LanguageData.VFEAncients.FireAtPawnsDesc: Allow the point-defense turret to fire at enemy pawns within range, like a normal turret would.
LanguageData.VFEAncients.FireAtProjectilesDesc: Allow the point-defense turret to fire at incoming explosive projectiles, such as rockets and mortar shells.
LanguageData.VFEAncients.PowerChoice: The process of injecting super-nanites has finished. Because your lab equipment includes a nanite sampler, you may now select between the two power and weakness pairs for {0} to obtain.
LanguageData.VFEAncients.ConfirmSendPawn: This supply slingshot contains the pawn {PAWN_labelShort}. You will not be able to get {PAWN_pronoun} back if you send {PAWN_pronoun} away. Launch anyway?
LanguageData.VFEAncients.CancelOpDesc: Decide not to do an operation on {PAWN} and eject {PAWN_pronoun} from the gene-tailroing pod.
LanguageData.VFEAncients.SupplyCrateArrived: A supply crate is touching down nearby. It's a trade from another vault, and will contain items of equal value to the items you've sent
LanguageData.VFEAncient.AvailableOperationsCannotBeAp: Available operations cannot be applied on
LanguageData.VFEAncients.MatForRepair: What material must be used to repair this at a mending table.
